name: mysophobia
content:

fear of germs (= very small organisms that cause disease): He lived his final years immobilized by mysophobia. Germophobia is known in medical circles as mysophobia. See also
germophobia
More examplesFewer examplesShe has been diagnosed with mysophobia, an irrational fear of germs.How does it feel to suffer from mysophobia?She is fastidious about herself and her home, in a way that suggests misophobia.
